statements.statement: It is harder for two working parents to raise children than it is easy for them to earn enough to live comfortably.
It appears that more women working for pay outside the home has made it easier for families to live comfortably, but harder for parents to raise children
Increasing women in the workforce has the perceived effect of making family life more difficult, but has increased wages
Most of the people surveyed said that the increasing number of women working outside the home makes family life harder.

Research has show in 2013 that while women working outside of the home has made it moderately easier to earn a comfortable living it has also made it significantly harder for parents to raise children.
While women working outside their home tends to make it easier for their families to live more comfortable lives, it seems to make their personal lives more difficult.
Women working outside the home generate enough money to help live comfortably.

Women in the last year feel that working outside the home has made it much easier for their family to live comfortably, but has made it much more difficult to raise their kids or keep a marriage successful and happy.
As families earn more money due to dual incomes, it becomes increasingly difficult for parents to raise children.
According to 74% of those asked, the increasing number of women who work outside the home have made it harder for parents to raise children.

67 % of women who work outside home has made their family to live comfortably, only 35% of women have said that working has made their marriage successful and easier and 74% of  women said that only only 19% its easier to raise the children while working.
Women working makes it much easier for families to earn enough to live comfortably.
Many people believe that women in the workforce is negatively affecting family life
While more believe that women working allow greater financial security for families, it is also believed that women working outside the home makes it more difficult to raise children.
People think women working outside the house makes it easier to earn enough to live comfortably, but harder to raise children and maintain a successful marriage.

The increasing number of women working for pay outside the home has made it easier for families to live comfortably, but it has made it harder for marriages to be successful and for parents to raise children.
As the morwe women enter the workforce it appears that to produce a negative effect of making it "harder" for parents ro raise children.
The trend shows that more families are earning enough to live comfortably but more marriages are harder as a result.
Because more women have been entering the workforce, it has become easier for families to earn enough to live comfortably.
A majority of people believe that women working outside the home has made it harder to raise children.
More people believe that women working for pay outside the household makes it harder to raise children.
The Blue-Green color splitting into an lighter version of the same color is the most important trend.
The chances are extremely good that if you believe women working outside the home makes it easier for the family economically, you also believe it makes it harder parentally.
Having women work outside of the home has made it easier for familes to eran enough money, harder for marriages to be successful, and more difficult for parents to raise children.
The main reason women are working for pay outside the home is to earn more money to live comfortably.
74 percent say it is harder to raise children with women working.

Women who work outside the home, while they may earn more money for their families overall, have contrarily negative affects to their personal lives including but not limited to their marriage and childcare.
While having a second income makes paying bills easier, it also makes raising children more difficult.
74% of people think that women working outside of the home makes it harder for parents to raise children.
The increase in number of women in the workplace has made it more difficult for parents to raise children.

nuggets.nugget: A large majority of people think having a woman work for pay outside the home makes it harder for parents to raise children.
One third of respondants think that a woman working makes it easier for a marriage to be successful.
Roughly 15% of respondants didn't think that a woman working had an effect on a marriage's success.
Many people think having a woman work for pay outside the home makes it harder for marriages to be successful.
Almost one third of respondants think that a woman working makes it harder for a family to earn enough to live comfortably.
A majority of people think having a woman work for pay outside the home makes it easier for a family to earn enough to live comfortably.
